import React, { Component } from "react"; import s from "./add-post.module.scss"; import Alert from "../test/Alert"; export default class AddPostFrom extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { gender: null, age: null, ethnicity_id: null, hair_id: null, eye_id: null, height: null, affiliation_id: null, availableto_ids: [], availability_ids: [], number: null, email: null, model_name: null, photo: [], about: null, video_link: null, summary: null, second_name: null, account_name: null, category_id: null, state_id: null, city_id: null, photo_vertical: null, photo_horizontal: null }; } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); (this.state.gender.length && +this.state.age >= 18 && this.state.ethnicity.length && this.state.hair_color.toString().length && this.state.eye_color.toString().length && this.state.height.toString().length && this.state.affiliation.length && this.state.number.toString().length > 9 && this.state.number.toString().length < 12 && this.state.email.length && this.state.model_name.length && this.state.video_link.length && this.state.about.length && this.state.available_to.length && this.state.availability.length && this.state.summary.length && this.state.second_name.length && this.state.account_name.length && this.state.category.length) ? this.props.addProviderPost({ gender: this.state.gender, age: this.state.age, ethnicity_id: this.state.ethnicity, hair_id: 1, eye_id: 1, height: 2, affiliation_id: 1, availableto_ids: [1], availability_ids: [1], number: "0993214789", email: "test2@test.com", model_name: "testName", photo: [model, model], about: " about about about about about", video_link: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpzblZceMDg", summary: "sdvbfjh fsdajkfasjd f fsdaf ajs dfjl asflj saflj sa", second_name: "name", account_name: "name", category_id: 1, state_id: 1, city_id: 1, photo_vertical: this.state.photo, photo_horizontal: this.state.photo, }) : this.props.showAlert("ALERT"); }; render() { return (
ADDING POST
